CustomField.description:
Number of days since the Opportunity was Won. Stops counting once training has occurred.
Old Formula: Training_Date__c - Opportunity__r.CloseDate,
CustomField.formula: IF( Opportunity__r.IsClosed, IF( OR( ISPICKVAL(Status__c,'Installation complete'), ISPICKVAL(Status__c,'Follow up complete') ), Training_Date__c - Contract_Sent_Date__c, TODAY() - Opportunity__r.CloseDate ), TODAY() - DATEVALUE(CreatedDate) )
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Number of days since PO received. Stops counting once training is done.
CustomField.label: Age (in days)
